title: RHOP Reunion Recap w/ Matt Rogers & Dave Mizzoni! + Prom & RHOA Meeting Drew!
itunes:title: RHOP Reunion Recap w/ Matt Rogers & Dave Mizzoni! + Prom & RHOA Meeting Drew!
itunes:subtitle: Danny is joined with Matt Rogers and Dave Mizzoni of Gayme Show for the Real Housewives of Potomac reunion recap! They discuss the fashion of it all, Monique's binder, music, and more. They also dive into Prom on Netflix. Danny then recaps this we...
description:
Danny is joined with Matt Rogers and Dave Mizzoni of Gayme Show for the Real Housewives of Potomac reunion recap! They discuss the fashion of it all, Monique's binder, music, and more. They also dive into Prom on Netflix. Danny then recaps this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured the introduction of TWO new cast members.


Prom: 36:42ish

RHOA: 50:50ish


Buy Everything Iconic merch at EverythingIconic.store


PS Subscribe to Danny's holiday podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, wherever you get your pods!
